biotools.summary: A multispecies integrative information system dedicated to plant and fungi pests.. It allows researchers to access genetic, phenotypic and genomic data. It is used by both large international projects and the French National Research Institute for Agriculture, Food and Environment

bioschemas.name: Genetic and Genomic Information System (GnpIS)
bioschemas.summary: A multispecies integrative information system dedicated to plant and fungi pests.. It allows researchers to access genetic, phenotypic and genomic data. It is used by both large international projects and the French National Research Institute for Agriculture, Food and Environment
